subject: Ali Express Order 3063447268707949
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,

I have Ordered the Simsonn Pro X Pedals via Ali Express and they show a really long shipping time. Order 3063447268707949.

They will be a present for my younger brother for birthday on November 25. Is there any way to get them before that date, so i can gift them to him? Then i can get him the haptics for christmas so he has everything he needs. This would be incredible. Thank you for trying.

Kind Regards and have a great day,
Basti
